about_the_game:
Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle is a thrilling journey from a small-time gangster to the revered Godfather of Hollywood, Las Vegas, and Chicago in the Prohibition Era!

Dive into the role of a drug mafia gangster in Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle, navigating the complexities of drug dealing in this realistic 3D simulator. Grow your empire through strategic buying and selling with various dealers. Immerse yourself in the underworld, engage in street fights, and interact with mafia figures to secure profits.



Explore the drug dealer market, partake in strategic games, and become the legendary godfather in this action-packed mafia city game.



Test your skills, avoid police chases, and rise as a powerful gangster. Unlock new missions, increase coins, and experience the thrill of drug mafia 3D with seamless gameplay.



Whether you're a Narcos universe enthusiast or an RPG aficionado seeking thrilling gameplay, Narcos Empire RPG awaits. Download now, embark on your criminal saga, and become the undisputed kingpin in this immersive RPG experience. Don't miss your opportunity—forge your criminal legacy in Narcos Game Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle.



In the Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle game, you can sell weed, fight mobsters, and upgrade your skills in a crime mafia city. You can also develop your own underworld empire and join the mafia bosses.



Drug Dealer Sim: Street Hustle is a weed tycoon simulation of real-life drug dealing, with players aiming to become legendary godfathers of drug mafia. They can taste the blood of drug deals and create their meth lab. Players can indulge in street gangs and join other mafias in the grand gangster games for empire wars.



Live the glamorous life of a lowlife gangster, running your cartel, committing crimes, orchestrating heists, starting a bud farm, and cultivating weed to dominate the underworld. Rule with force or cunning as you intimidate rival gangster cartels and engage in shootouts over lucrative bud farms, striving to become the most notorious narcos in Prohibition history. Recruit new mob narcos in Drugs Dealer Gang Wars, build your gangster family, and lead them to greatness. Launder money, grow weed, and participate in epic heists to etch your name as the richest and most influential mafia in history. Can your Mafia Family become the new Cosa Nostra and make history?

In this drug dealer simulator, build a drug empire by buying and selling drugs through dealers. Play as a legendary godfather in a world of crime, showcasing the drug mafia real-life simulation of a drug dealer like Narcos. Mafia tycoons expand their empire by buying and selling drugs through dealers, navigating gang wars, and starting bud farms. Drug dealers participate in the drug war, creating a drug empire through weed dealers. Join the mafia and sell various drugs to build your empire and become a mafia boss. The gangster mafia Vegas game is a top-rated drug dealing game, allowing players to expand their drug empire and engage in intense combat in a crime mafia city.

Features:

- Build connections with prospective clients and customers.
- Control the demand and supply.
- Develop your own online weed company.
- Realistic creation from seedlings to harvest.
- The gangster can perform heists, killing and smuggling.
- Drug dealers may modify their character skills.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 2Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 4Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
